```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
dB <- c(80, 105)#sort(sample(0:120, 2))
  
ans <- signif(10^((dB[2] - dB[1]) / 10), 2)

sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, delta = ans/10, range = c(0, ans*100), format = FALSE, digits = 6)
sc$questions <- sprintf("%s", formatC(sc$questions, format = "G", digits = 3))
```

Question
========
How many times more intense is a `r dB[2]` dB sound than a `r dB[1]` dB sound?

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```

Solution
========
The relative intensity of the sound is

$$ I_2 / I_1 = 10^{`r dB[2]/10` - `r dB[1]/10`} = `r ans` $$
